citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1300 on
15-NOV-16.
The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee was away from the facility and would not be
available until evening. No other authorized person was available for inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1300 on
15-NOV-16.
The inspector was informed by a family member that the licensee was away from the facility and would not be
available until evening.  No other authorized person was available for inspection.
